articles.title: Industry’s Ken Leung Doesn’t Need to Know What’s Next For Eric - Vulture
articles.description: For now, Ken Leung is treating Eric’s walk away as the end point of a performance that was shaped in response to one word he felt the character was telling him: “Help.”

articles.description: The Simpsons EP Mike Price breaks down the 800th episode’s Pitt parody, Philly guest stars, teases the next movie, and the one death line fans fear.

articles.title: Spirit Awards: Winners List - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: 'Train Dreams' won three awards, including best feature. 'Adolescence'; 'The Secret Agent'; 'Sorry, Baby'; and 'The Perfect Neighbor' also were among the winners.

articles.title: 13 EXTREMELY Messy Celeb Cheating Scandals That Played Out In Front Of The Entire World - BuzzFeed
articles.description: Offset crashed Cardi B's headlining performance with a lavish floral arrangement that said, "TAKE ME BACK, CARDI." After she rejected him, he tweeted, "thank god I ain't got no balloons."

articles.title: Timothy Very Dies: Manchester Orchestra Drummer Was 42 - Deadline
articles.description: Timothy Very, the drummer for Atlanta-based indie rock band Manchester Orchestra, has died. He was 42.

articles.title: Box Office: ‘Wuthering Heights’ Predicts $82M Global Bow But ‘GOAT’ Poses Surprise Threat in U.S. - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi's new movie Valentine's Day/Presidents Day was expected to open to $40 million in North America but Sony Animation and Stephen Curry's 'GOAT' is gaining ground far too quickly for comfort.

articles.title: ‘Sinners’ Star Wunmi Mosaku Has ‘Not Been Able to Celebrate’ Her Oscar Nomination Because of the ‘Killings of Renée Good and Alex Pretti by ICE’: How Could I ‘Enjoy the Moment?’ - Variety
articles.description: 'Sinners' star Wunmi Mosaku says she can't celebrate her Oscar nomination because of the 'killings of Renee Good and Alex Pretti by ICE.'

articles.title: Hollywood groups condemn ByteDance's AI video generator, claiming copyright infringement - AP News
articles.description: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations. They say Seedance 2.0 blatantly violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without permission.…

articles.title: 3 Doors Down Were Post-Grunge Hitmakers. But the Band Couldn’t Outrun Tragedy - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Brad Arnold, singer of 3 Doors Down who died this month at 47, is remembered by friends as a unifier, despite politics that could be seen as divisive.

articles.title: Is Savannah Guthrie Leaving ‘Today’? - TV Insider
articles.description: The ‘Today’ co-anchor is reportedly considering an exit from the NBC morning show amid the search for her missing mother, Nancy Guthrie.

articles.title: Maya Hawke Says ‘I Do’ in Romantic V-Day Wedding With Star-Studded ‘Stranger Things’ Guest List - Yahoo
articles.description: Maya Hawke quietly got married to Christian Lee Huston on Valentine’s Day, with her parents Ethan Hawke and Uma Thurman reuniting for the special day.

articles.title: Andrew's time as trade envoy should be investigated, says Vince Cable - BBC
articles.description: The former prince's alleged actions were "totally unacceptable", the ex-business secretary says.

articles.title: ‘Rose’ Review: Sandra Hüller Amazes, Again, in Markus Schleinzer’s Immaculately Controlled Tale of Gender Privilege - Variety
articles.description: Austrian auteur Markus Schleinzer returns with 'Rose,' a simple folk tragedy with searing emotional impact, led by a superb Sandra Hüller.

articles.title: Bad Bunny's Super Bowl halftime show was found not to have violated any rules following investigation - NME
articles.description: Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl halftime show was found not to have violated any rules following an investigation by the FCC.

articles.title: Bad Bunny bought out this Palo Alto restaurant after the Super Bowl - SFGATE
articles.description: Bad Bunny bought out Palo Alto restaurant Macarena for a Super Bowl halftime show after-party on Sunday, Feb. 8.
